version_description: Booyah! We squashed a few minor bugs and made some overall improvements, including some fixes to Cloud Save. Update the game and get back to your mega teeny battles!
Holy updates, Batman! We’ve fixed a few minor issues to make Teeny Titans the best it’s ever been.
iOS 12 users: this build fixes a crashing issue related to iOS 12.
Battle your friends! The Legion of Doom has arrived and they’ve brought the Multiplayer Beta with them. Enter the Hall of Doom to challenge your friends and collect new figures!

Holy updates, Batman! Check out what’s new in Teen Titans Go! Figure: local multiplayer battles, 12 new repaints, and fixed cloud save issues.

Download the update now!

Thanks for playing! Here's what's new:
-Bug fixes
-Performance improvements
-Privacy Policy updates
-Updated for new platform requirements
